songs.artist_names: DJ Drama (Ft. Chris Brown, LyQuin & Skeme)
songs.full_title: Wishing by DJ Drama (Ft. Chris Brown, LyQuin & Skeme)
songs.title: Wishing

description.plain:
DJ Drama created this song with a roster of artists at various level of notoriety: the mega famous Chris Brown, the indie rapper from Southern Cali Skeme, and LyQuin, who is in the nascent stage of his career, with just two mixtapes under his belt. This is the first major placement for producer JnatBeats (aside from a Lil Uzi Vert song).

This was the first song that Dram released ahead of his 2016 album Quality Street Music 2—the first installment dropped in 2012.

This song samples the intro of “Disrespectful” by Trey Songz & Mila J.

body.plain:
DJ Drama created this song with a roster of artists at various level of notoriety: the mega famous Chris Brown, the indie rapper from Southern Cali Skeme, and LyQuin, who is in the nascent stage of his career, with just two mixtapes under his belt. This is the first major placement for producer JnatBeats (aside from a Lil Uzi Vert song).

This was the first song that Dram released ahead of his 2016 album Quality Street Music 2—the first installment dropped in 2012.

This song samples the intro of “Disrespectful” by Trey Songz & Mila J.

45 ContributorsMy Moment Lyrics[Intro: DJ Drama & 2 Chainz]
You see I been waiting, waiting on that time
Feel me if you been waiting on yours
That moment, is close (Yeah)

[Chorus: Jeremih & 2 Chainz]
Tired of living day to day like everything is alright
Just waiting on that moment
Waiting on my moment (Yeah, 2 Chainz!)
Been waiting on my
[Verse 1: 2 Chainz & Jeremih]
Old dude met mom, it was on
Then he named me over a phone, prison term
Live and learn, sippin' syrup with my vision blurred
Take this cup of reality, niggas finna err
When you start from the bottom, you can see the top
So when you get to it, don't let 'em see the spot
Next thing you know, you lookin' for a rent sign
Upper echelon, bitch we skip line

I'm just waiting on that moment

Tired of livin' day to day like everything's alright
And every night, just one thing on my mind
I'm just waiting on that moment
Waiting on my moment

I'm just waiting on that moment
